EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Invite Watch the Live Feed 12-4-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Can’t be there in person? Join SpringOne Platform via the live stream
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=livestream&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=livestream&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> kicks off tomorrow. Can’t attend in person? Watch the SpringOne Platform main stage speakers <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=livestream&utm_medium=email%20link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> and tune in for some exciting product announcements from Pivotal.
When to Tune In: Tuesday, December 5 from 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. PT Wednesday, December 6 from 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. PT Thursday, December 7 from 9:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m. PT
Main Stage Talks from Tech Leaders: Hear SpringOne Platform keynote speakers from Pivotal, Boeing, HCSC, Google, Cloud Foundry Foundation, Mastercard, RedMonk, Microsoft, The Home Depot, Comcast, Accenture, and more.
Product News: Learn about the latest Spring and Pivotal Cloud Foundry product updates, including a major announcement you won’t want to miss!
We hope you’ll (virtually) join us <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=livestream&utm_medium=email%20link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> for an exciting week of news, talks and more!
The SpringOne Platform Team
